en.bdb: They were killed by Krishna like the moths, in search of the earthen lamp fall upon it, but do not return alive.2001.

verse.unicode: ਜਬ ਗੂਜਰ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਧਨ ਬਾਨ ਗਹਿਯੋ ਛਤ੍ਰਾਪਨ ਛਤ੍ਰਿਨ ਤੇ ਤੋ ਰਹਿਓ ॥

en.bdb: When the army was killed by Krishna, then, getting infuriated Rukmi said his army, “When Krishna, the milkman can hold the bow and arrows, then the Kshatriyas should also perform this task firmly”
